statements: SELECT * FROM trading_behavior;
SELECT user_id, transaction_timestamp, transaction_id FROM trading_behavior;
SELECT * FROM trading_behavior ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) FROM trading_behavior GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM trading_behavior WHERE user_id = '5f1f02a7-9812-4b57-b234-6d4c1d87322d';
SELECT * FROM trading_behavior WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT transaction_id, user_id FROM trading_behavior WHERE transaction_timestamp > '2022-02-14 08:00:00';
SELECT * FROM trading_behavior WHERE transaction_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-02-14 08:00:00' AND '2022-02-15 10:00:00' ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS transaction_count, AVG(transaction_timestamp) AS avg_timestamp FROM trading_behavior GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(user_id) > 1;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM trading_behavior ORDER BY user_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM trades WHERE trade_id = 1;
SELECT stock_symbol, quantity, price FROM trades WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM trades ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity, SUM(price) AS total_price FROM trades;
SELECT * FROM trades WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT stock_symbol, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM trades GROUP BY stock_symbol HAVING total_quantity > 1000 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT trade_id, stock_symbol, price FROM trades WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' AND quantity > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT AVG(price) AS avg_price, MIN(price) AS min_price, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM trades WHERE trade_id BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000;
SELECT * FROM trading_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, account_balance FROM user_accounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE registration_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_timestamp FROM trading_transactions ORDER BY transaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts JOIN user_profiles USING(user_id) WHERE first_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM trading_transactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM trading_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, account_balance FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance < 5000 ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM user_profiles WHERE registration_timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT user_id, account_balance FROM user_accounts INNER JOIN user_profiles ON user_accounts.user_id = user_profiles.user_id WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT * FROM user_transactions
SELECT user_id, amount FROM user_transactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT symbol, price FROM stock_prices ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT user_id, action FROM user_histories WHERE action = 'login'
SELECT trade_id, symbol, action FROM trade_analysis WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM user_transactions WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT user_id, amount FROM user_transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, AVG(amount) as avg_amount FROM user_transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT symbol, MAX(price) as max_price FROM stock_prices GROUP BY symbol;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(action) as total_actions FROM user_histories WHERE action = 'BUY' GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM traders;
SELECT trader_name, trader_location FROM traders WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT trade_id, stock_symbol, trade_type FROM trades WHERE trade_quantity > 100;
SELECT symbol, stock_name, market_cap, industry FROM market_data WHERE exchange = 'NYSE';
SELECT analysis_id, trader_id, analysis_type FROM analytics ORDER BY analysis_timestamp DESC;
SELECT trader_name, trader_location, registration_date FROM traders WHERE trader_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM trades WHERE trade_type = 'BUY' ORDER BY trade_timestamp DESC;
SELECT stock_name, market_cap FROM market_data WHERE exchange = 'NASDAQ' AND industry = 'Technology';
SELECT transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 10000 AND transaction_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT trader_name, trade_price FROM traders JOIN trades ON traders.trader_id = trades.trader_id WHERE trade_type = 'SELL';
